If something is wrong - IMPROVE it, don't REMOVE it. Just remove the words "authoritarian regime" and we have an accurate statement. I did not notice that particular qualifier when adding the example.

undo- If you had bothered to read the article before jumping in you would know that this section talks about government reprisals NOT terrorism
